title: The Veiled Soul
description: To control her, they stripped her of her memories.Trapped behind the veil, Lia pays for crimes she doesn’t remember committing. As a grim reaper, the split of time between life and death is the only chance she gets to feel anything real.To trap her, they stripped her of her soul.When she finds herself on the other side, she thought she’d been given a second chance. She tries to learn how to live again, but while the prison has changed, her warden remains the same. Her only contact with the reaper realm is her old master, Westin, and he’s waiting for her slip up.If she kills again, she’ll be trapped forever.Her anchor to the physical realm, Hunter, sees something beautiful in her, something she has never seen in herself. But he has no idea what she’s done in the past.She has hundreds of years of blood on her hands, and something inside her yearns for more.Someone knows her darkest desires, and he wants her on his side. As a serial killer recreates her history, she’ll have to choose between the man who offers her everything she’s ever wanted, the man who believes she can never change, and the man who doesn’t see the darkness hovering around her. The secrets and the bodies are piling up, and Lia is about to discover the true weight of her own soul.
author: Abbie Chandler
